creditline: Gift of Paula and Mack Lee
description: tiny, light-colored, 5-petaled blossoms on long stems in 3 clumps; black ground; fern-like foliage at bottom; tipped-in image/sheet
marks:
Title, Date and Inscription 

on back of mount,  LLC  of mount, printed in black ink: [174. APHYLLO
title: Aphyllon Uniflorum, Thalesia Uniflora, One-Flowered Broom-Rape, Cancer-Root, Plate 174 from, "Wild Flowers of New England"
